articles.author: Taylor Lyles
articles.title: DayZ, Rust Teams Troll The Day Before Studio's Closure Announcement - IGN
articles.description: The developers behind DayZ and Rust have taken to X/Twitter to troll The Day Before developer after it announced its studio was closing its doors following the release of The Day Before.
articles.content:
In case you have not heard, FNTASTIC, the developer behind The Day Before, announced its closure less than a week after launching its zombie game in Early Access.
To accompany the announcement, FNTA… [+2011 chars]
